snippet: Remarks by Yang Jiechi, the foreign minister, were China’s highest level response yet to intensifying accusations that the Chinese military may be engaging in cyberespionage.
abstract: China renews call for international rules and cooperation on Internet espionage issues, while insisting that accusations of Chinese government involvement in recent hacking attacks are part of international smear campaign.
lead_paragraph: Remarks by Yang Jiechi, the foreign minister, were China’s highest level response yet to intensifying accusations that the Chinese military may be engaging in cyberespionage.

headline.seo: China Calls for Global Hacking Rules
headline.main: In Wake of Cyberattacks, China Seeks New Rules
headline.print_headline: In Wake of Cyberattacks, China Seeks New Rules
